name: Project SF
description:
This is an FPS game that uses guns to kill enemies and bosses, collect keys, and clear the stage.

Let's defeat the boss and gather the keys and clear them!

-You can defeat the boss and the enemy and collect the keys.

-If you collect four keys, you can clear the stage.

Three Routes and Four Stages

-There are three routes in one stage.

-You can enjoy four stages.

It's an FPS game set in SF. There's an enemy in front of you.  Shoot the enemy with your gun and keep going forward. There's a boss in front of you. Fight the boss and win. There are four keys on the stage. Find the four keys. If you find four keys, you can clear the stage.
